resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107418</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107418</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085838</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Racing against catastrophe: a webquest for English I teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laufen gegen Katastrophe: ein webquest für 
Lehrer Englisch I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Emballage contre la catastrophe : un webquest
pour des professeurs de l'anglais I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Competir de encontro ao catastrophe: um o 
mais webquest para professores do inglês I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correndo contro la catastrofe: un più 
webquest per gli insegnanti di inglese I</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγώνας ενάντια στην καταστροφή: ένας pjo' 
ωεψquεστ για τους αγγλικούς δασκάλους ι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El competir con contra catástrofe: un la 
ma's webquest para los profesores del inglés I</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students often have difficulty making connections between classic books and their contemporary lives. This Webquest puts you in the role of student to find learning strategies that scaffold the meaning-making process as your own students read.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer haben häufig Schwierigkeit, 
Beziehungen zwischen klassischen Büchern und ihren 
Zeitgenosselebensdauern herzustellen. Dieses Webquest setzt Sie 
in die Rolle des Kursteilnehmers ein, um Lernenstrategien zu finden, 
die Gestell der Bedeutung-bildende Prozeß als Ihre eigenen 
Kursteilnehmer las.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants ont souvent la difficulté établir 
des rapports entre les livres classiques et leurs vies de 
contemporain. Ce Webquest vous met dans le rôle de l'étudiant 
pour trouver les stratégies d'étude que l'échafaudage le processus 
defabrication en tant que vos propres étudiants a lues.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes têm frequentemente a dificuldade 
fazer conexões entre livros clássicos e suas vidas do 
comtemporâneo. Este Webquest põe-no no papel do estudante para
encontrar as estratégias de aprendizagem que o scaffold o processo 
meaning-fazendo como seus próprios estudantes leu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi hanno spesso difficoltà fare i 
collegamenti fra i libri classici e le loro vite del contemporaneo. 
Questo Webquest li mette nel ruolo dell'allievo per trovare le 
strategie di apprendimento che l'impalcatura il processo 
significato-facente come vostri propri allievi ha letto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές έχουν συχνά τη δυσκολία που κάνει τις 
συνδέσεις μεταξύ των κλασικών βιβλίων και των σύγχρονων ζωών 
τους. Αυτό το Webquest σας βάζει στο ρόλο του σπουδαστή 
για να βρεί τις στρατηγικές εκμάθησης που το ικρίωμα η 
έννοια-κάνοντας διαδικασία ως σπουδαστές σας διάβασε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes tienen a menudo dificultad el hacer
de conexiones entre los libros clásicos y sus vidas del 
contemporáneo. Este Webquest le pone en el papel del estudiante
para encontrar las estrategias que aprenden que el andamio el proceso 
de significado-fabricacio'n como sus propios estudiantes leyó.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
